meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Shapiro Sue Phillips Brian Hindelang Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4374.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Michael Shapiro, a college teacher from Honolulu, Hawaii
Sue Phillips, a school band director from Crystal Lake, Illinois
Brian Hindelang, an electronics technician from San Antonio, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,800)

tr.td: BORN ON THE FOURTH OF JULY
WALL STREET
PLATOON
SALVADOR
THE "DOOR"s
OLIVER STONE
